attributes.action: Tackle crime much more effectively and act NOW!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decent people of this country are sick and tired of policies and formats which do not tackle the issues we face, head-on.

1)Make punishment fit the crime - no excuses

2)We will pay more tax if this is what is needed

3)Build more prisons and use them.

4)Stop pussy footing around and deal with crime

5)Any crime from an outsider should be automatically dealt with by expulsion from UK

6)Don't insult us with political words - Act

6)Act Now
